title: All mirrors are down: [Unknown host: github.com, Unknown host: mirror.bazel.build]:when I used bazel build .
body_html:
My mechine cannot connect to the internet,I set proxy,but I can't bulid it.
WARNING: ignoring http_proxy in environment.
WARNING: The following configs were expanded more than once: [cuda]. For repeatable flags, repeats are counted twice and may lead to unexpected behavior.
